about_the_game:
Hey, soldier! Are you ready to take your place in Raidfield 2?! This game will take you to WW2

Raidfield 2 features the following;
- You can play with your friends.
- You can control tanks, planes and turret vehicles.
- Customizable soldier
- Daily Objectives
- 16 Weapons and +40 skins
- 8 Different battlefield heroes
- Legendary WW2 battles
- 4 types of battle vehicles from different countries: USA, Russia, Japan, and Germany!
- In the Conquest mode, you must move on with your unit to win the battle and capture the three regions on the battlefield.
- With the War supply points you will win in the battlefield, you can use the destructive war vehicles on the battlefield.
- World war polygon style battlefields
- With tanks and bombers, you can destroy all the houses on the map.
- You can develop your soldiers, tanks and planes with war supply scores and you can be the wanted soldier of the battlefield.
- Amazing World War 2 experience

It will reward you with the successes of the battlefield, giving fear to your opponents.
These awards;

- 42 Achievements
- 30 ranks (Private to General)
- Up to 150 ’character level
- You will earn extra points when your achievements are completed.

Your troops are waiting for you!

Hey, soldier! Are you ready to take your place in Raidfield 2?! This game will take you to WW2

Raidfield 2 features the following;
- You can play with your friends.
- You can control tanks, planes and turret vehicles.

- 4 types of battle vehicles from different countries: USA, Russia, Japan, and Germany!
- In the Conquest mode, you must move on with your unit to win the battle and capture the three regions on the battlefield.
- With the War supply points you will win in the battlefield, you can use the destructive war vehicles on the battlefield.
- World war polygon style battlefields
- With tanks and bombers, you can destroy all the houses on the map.

- Amazing World War 2 experience

It will reward you with the successes of the battlefield, giving fear to your opponents.
These awards;

- 30 ranks (Private to General)
- Up to 150 ’character level

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 (And later)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 – 1024 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 (And later)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX6120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti or Radeon HD 6770
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 – 1024 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX6120

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

name: Raidfield 2

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (And later)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 – 1024 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (And later)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX6120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti or Radeon HD 6770
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Get in your boots and out in the battlefield. It's 1944 and the heat of the war is more than ever. In this cross-platform WW-2 shooter you take control of axis or ally units in a fast paced combat. You can also play with your friends on foot, tanks or even planes.
